title: Introducing the Salesforce Insights Connector | Similarweb
description: Introducing the Salesforce Insights Connector - Connect the dots between web traffic and business performance. Track lead generation, conversion rates, and more.
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesIntroducing the Salesforce Insights Connector Updates Introducing the Salesforce Insights Connector Start your free trial by Sigal Berezin , Sales Intel. Content Manager at Similarweb 3 Min. February 17, 2020 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic This goes out to all our sales reps. Tired of flicking between tabs (and getting lost in the meantime) as you engage with prospects? Let us help you! The Similarweb Sales Workspace has created the Similarweb Insights Connector to keep you in full view of all the insights Similarweb has to offer, right on your prospect‚Äôs Salesforce account page. What Is the Salesforce Insight Connector? This new Similarweb Insights Connector allows sales representatives to have full visibility on their prospect‚Äôs information, get notifications, and reach out to them using Digital Intelligence directly within their CRM. It‚Äôs basically the total package üòç. Why Was It Created? The end goal of the Similarweb Insights Connector is to allow sales representatives to easily access all the information they would need in order to engage their prospects with Digital Intelligence data ‚Äì right from within the Salesforce CRM. They can also download this checklist to help them prepare ahead of their first call. What Information Does the Salesforce Insight Connector Provide? The Similarweb Insights Connector includes information on: Competitors ‚Äì Allows for benchmarking the size of the brand, and to see what this brand‚Äôs reach is when compared against its main competitors. Great for identifying potential pain points even the prospect may not be aware of. Marketing mix ‚Äì Let‚Äôs users identify a website‚Äôs marketing strategy, and gives a clear view of their performance as compared to their competitors. Great for identifying current marketing spend, for example on paid acquisition giving an indication to marketing budgets. Geography ‚Äì See where a website gets its traffic from. Perfect for understanding opportunities to sell cross-border products (e.g. payments, shipping, localization services). Engagement metrics ‚Äì Allows for the identification of a website‚Äôs digital strategy and performance against competitors. Great for identifying opportunities for optimization, and using this to create a compelling event during the sales cycle. If you‚Äôd like to receive more information about how the Salesforce Insight Connector can help your business, or see a demo, get in contact here. In Summary The Salesforce Insight Connector will make your sales team‚Äôs life easier, and provide full visibility into their prospect‚Äôs important metrics. And if you‚Äôre looking for some free leads, we‚Äôve created a list of 100 sites that need more paid traffic. For the list of UK leads, click below. For the list of US leads, click below. by Sigal Berezin Sales Intel. Content Manager at Similarweb Sigal weaves data and insights into engaging content. She holds degrees in Communications and Security & Diplomacy and enjoys reading, traveling, and exploring Tel Aviv.
